title: march 3: the beginning of time (magazine) (with Charlotte Alter)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the inception of a long running weekly magazine, Time. Afterwards, she talks about the release of Khalid’s debut, American Teen. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
